page.title: 05BYFIELD FESTIVALS(JAN-AUG)
page.content: THE FIRST FESTIVAL OF THE YEAR IS THE PANTOMIME.LAST YEAR IT WAS "ALI BABA AND THE FORTY THIEVES".THESE PANTOMIMES ARE USUALLY INTENDED TO ENTERTAIN CHILDREN ALTHOUGH THEY ARE ENJOYED BY ADULTS TOO.THE MAY FESTIVAL IS HELD AROUND THE END OF MAY,ALTHOUGH IT IS OFTEN POSTPONED DUE TO BAD WEATHER. THE ATRACTIONS INCLUDE COUNTRY DANCING, STALLS AND GAMES.AT THE END OF JUNE,WE HAVE THE VILLAGE FETE.THIS IS A BIG OCCASION AND OVER 500 PEOPLE FROM ALL AROUND BYFIELD COME TO WATCH EXHIBITIONS AND HAVE GOES ON RIDES AND FUN-STALLS.THERE IS USUALLY A PET SHOW AND AN INTER-STREET TUG-OF-WAR. THEN COMES THE SUMMER HOLIDAYS AND A BIG GAP WHEN NO FETES OR FESTIVALS ARE HELD.
